reviewText:
This DVD does exactly what it promises.  After using it, I styled my hair, and it really looked way better than it usually does.  I have to admit, there will be some days where I may take a few short cuts, since this is the professional job, but going through the styling process step by step really does give superior results.

This DVD is thorough. It takes you through the whole styling process one time, and then gives a short review.  I've gotten several compliments since using these tecniques.
